::Spears::

She smiled a wide smile." Thanks.  I really mean it. Thanks."

She smiled as she walked along.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus looks at Spears as she stops, Ramulus also stopping. She 
didn't look 
> like a traitorous bot, and there had been other ex-predacons in the 
Neo Beast 
> Wars, most of which have since died for the Maximal cause. He 
shruggs.
> 
> "You looked pretty loyal screaming at a Pred to switch you for his 
hostage, 
> I'm not going to make you leave," he sighs, "In fact, it would be 
better if 
> you stayed. We'll need all the help we can get."
